revision.comment: RAM: M12L2561616A-6T is 32 MiB. If there are two then there is 64 MiB total.
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=MiniStation Air |revision=HDW-PU3 |is_manuf=No |type=mobile NAS, |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350;RT5350F; |cpu1_cspeed=350 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350;RT5350F; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=battery, portable, |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} Linux kernel spotted insight of firmware, but no source is provided: http://buffalo.jp/support_ap/support/products/hdw_pu3.html Other sources:
http://www.3dnews.ru/645096
* battery Li-ion, 3.7V, 2860mAh
